titles.title: Small Business Disaster Recovery Assistance Improvement Act of 2007
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to provide expedited disaster assistance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2365-2366)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
2/28/2007--Introduced.
Small Business Disaster Recovery Assistance Improvement Act of 2007 - Directs the Administrator of the Small Business Administration (SBA) to establish and implement an expedited disaster assistance business loan program to provide small businesses with immediate disaster assistance.
